description:
Funny Animals puzzles for kids and babies is a great opportunity to keep your baby in the age from 2 to 3 years old busy, giving him or her a chance to immerse into the fascinating world of this learning game.

This colorful Montessori game brings your baby into the amazing world with lovely music where he or she will be able to put wooden puzzles together in order to create numerous pets and animals while popping air-balloons and listening to their sounds.

This game is great for both boys and girls and helps to develop and improving memory, attention, logical thinking, and fine motor skills, amusing your kids and bringing them a lot of fun at the same time.

Is your baby crying and tries to grizzle while you are trying to talk with the doctor in the hospital? Is your kid bored at the departure gate at the airport or at the train station? There’s a solution for all these cases! Just give him a tablet for kids or a smartphone, launch Puzzles for Kids and forget about their whining and naughtiness. This application is proven to be successful!
